com.badlogic.gdx.assets.loaders

Interface FileHandleResolver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsoluteFileHandleResolver, ExternalFileHandleResolver, InternalFileHandleResolver, LocalFileHandleResolver, ResolutionFileResolver

    public interface FileHandleResolver
    Interface for classes the can map a file name to a FileHandle. Used to allow the AssetManager to load resources from anywhere or implement caching strategies.
    Author:
    mzechner

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FileHandle resolve(java.lang.String fileName)

      • resolve
